name: Federal Power Bill
description:
This law makes all electrical power on White Tiger a federal resources controlled by the federal government. 
The federal government will provide monetary compensation to the producer.

Cost and compensation can be seen in the government bank accounts stated below. If the bank account has 2,5€ in it that means that it will tax/compenstate you 2,5€ per kwh depending if you are a consumer/producer

Cost to use 1 kwh can be seen in the government bank account "# Federal Power Bill Payout (kwh)" 1 kwh is equal to running a machine that uses 1000 power for one hour
Compensation for Combustion Generators can be seen in the government bank account # Federal Power Bill Payout (CG)
Compensation for Industrial Generators can be seen in the government bank account # Federal Power Bill Payout (IG)
Compensation for Solar and Wind Generators can be seen in the government bank account # Federal Power Bill Payout (Solar and Wind)

Power bill invoices in a suspended state and section 3 collects its every hour to reduce the amount of spam in our citizens accounts.

Section 1 Covers the invoicing of electrical power
Section 2 Covers compensation for producing power for Solar and Wind
Section 3 Covers collecting the invoice for power consumption from its suspended state
Section 4 Covers compensation for producing power for a Industrial Generator
Section 5 Covers compensation for producing power for a Combustion Generator
Section 6 blocks all transfers into the bankaccount unless you are MoI or PM

///Notes for the Federal Governments! 
*Towns/States who operate their own powerplants needs to get their powerplant districted else the mayor or governor will be geting paid for the towns/states powerplant into their private account. 
This will result in the town/state not geting any payments for the produced power and you would need to sort that through a different law/contract.

Author of the law: XoY, feel free to send a DM if you are wondering anything about the law.

properties.Title: Power Invoice
properties.UserDescription: Invoices the use of all electric power to all entities. All used electric power by elected officials will be assumed to be for private used. Elected official who operates government owned items that consume power can contact the Federal government and ask to get that deed districted into the Federal Power Bill District to get that power excluded from this law.

properties.Title: Payment for providing Green Power(solar and wind)
properties.UserDescription:
Gives a payment to Citizens for providing electrical power through a Solar or Wind Generator. The amount compensated can be seen in the bank account # Federal Power Bill Payout (Solar and Wind)
Towns and States needs to request to get their power plans districted into the Federal Power Bill District to avoid geting paid for the towns/states powerplant into their private account.

properties.Title: Handels payments of Industrial Generators
properties.UserDescription:
Gives a payment to Citizens for providing electrical power through a industrical generator. The amount compensated can be seen in the bank account # Federal Power Bill Payout (IG)
Towns and States needs to request to get their power plans districted into the Federal Power Bill District to avoid geting paid for the towns/states powerplant into their private account.
